boardgame.name: Century: Golem Edition
boardgame.description: Century: Golem Edition is a re-themed version of Century: Spice Road set in the world of Caravania. In Century: Golem Edition, players are caravan leaders who travel the famed golem road to deliver crystals to the far reaches of the world. Each turn, players perform one of four actions:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Establish a trade route (by taking a market card)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Make a trade or harvest crystals (by playing a card from hand)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fulfill a demand (by meeting a victory point card's requirements and claiming it)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rest (by taking back into your hand all of the cards you've played)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The last round is triggered once a player has claimed their fifth victory point card, then whoever has the most victory points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
